name: William Sommerlatte
text: Excellent place. The pizza is pretty good and cooked right where it needs to be. Salads are done very well too, would recommend getting the dressing on the side instead of tossed. The beer selection is absolutely awesome as well, good ‚Ä¶More

name: Steven Lockwood
text: Excellent pizza. We came for lunch, and had the pizza/salad combo special. We loved it, and will definitely return.

name: stacey wy
text: The pizza is good, the spinach salad is yummy! Comfortable atmosphere, friendly staff, plenty of places to shop nearby.

name: Keyur Bhatnagar
text: Awesome pizza with a nice beer collection. They have good vegetarian options too.

name: Luba Overstreet
text: The pizza is delicious....many options of toppings and combinations, the crust is crispy, not overly greasy...everything is great. We had a fantastic waitress that delivered some of the best service I've had in a long time. And...the atmosphere is great.

name: Clifton Harper
text: Wednesday musical bingo is awesomely fun! Server was good. Pizza was great.

name: Tiny Bunny Sakura
text: Friendly staff and nice atmosphere. I love their tomatoes they put on their pizzas. My only complaint is that on a couple occasions, the crust has been burnt.

name: Tae McDaniel
text: We love Brixx. Everything I've ever eaten there is delicious; from the pizzas to the pastas. So yummy! My favorite is the 4x4.

name: Andrea Magan
text: Best bruschetta in town, and their Bronx Bomber Pizza is the bomb. Anything I ever ate there was delicious.  And the staff is super nice

name: Dale Goldberg
text: Good food and good friendly staff. Only complaint is the spinach salmon salad was a little bland but chances are you're not coming here for the salad. Pizza and pasta offerings were great! Good family atmosphere too.

name: Gina Sullivan
text: Best spegetti & meatballs‚ù§Ô∏è Service was top notch. Went w my family. They sat the four of us right away. Server was on top of everything. We went last night, sat at the table right outside the patio door. Wish I remembered the name of waiter, and manager. Thank you for a great night. Thumbs up üëç

name: Jacob Kroskey
text: Good good good. Pizza nice and thin crust, the breadsticks are good. Only thing that is ok is the pasta. But it deserves 5 stars!!!

name: John Donaldson
text: Just had the turkey with berry chutney on focaccia. They added arugula which gave it a unique flavor. The presentation looked fabulous on the plate and tasted fresh.  This is a number one spot for lunch in Peachtree City.

name: Lisa Dobbs
text: The arugula and pear salad, along with the pear and walnut pizza are delicious! The buffalo chicken pizza is really good as well.

name: Nicandro Garcia
text: The food is ok, pizza was too thin for my liking and a little burnt. The toppings were delicious though and it was extra cheesy. The wings were also delicious but a bit pricey. What made this experience worthy of 3 stars was the way we were ‚Ä¶More

name: Jillian Canady
text: Don‚Äôt say you‚Äôre open until 11PM on Saturday and then close an entire our early. Checked online to make sure you would still be open and here a good bit of time before you were supposed to close. Doors are locked and girls in the back stared at us like we were dumb. Worst experience ever here.

name: Rickey Hall
text: My first time here.. truly impressed.. I had the Italian sandwich.. by far the best Italian sandwich I have ever had.. the service was prompt and extremely friendly. This will be a must have anytime I'm in peachtree city.

name: Rich Phillips
text: See Angel, she's amazing and great service. Food is always great

name: David Blais
text: The Buffalo Chicken Pizza that I had ordered was Awesome and the staff are great. We had a large party and the staff were very friendly and accommodating. Everyone in the party enjoyed the food and would recommend Brixx Wood Fired Pizza.

name: Christian Price
text: Good food, just be open when advertised. Brixx is not open past 10 on saturdays and their sign and internet both say they'll be open until 11. Workers inside refused to answer calls when we were outside calling the establishment asking for ‚Ä¶More

name: Indu Raji
text: Great family restaurant.   My kids just love the pizza.  Even us parents enjoy the selection of food.  They have a nice outdoor sitting area too that we love..

name: Addie Davis
text: Tyler and Diego are the best bartenders.  Great pizza and beer! I had an awesome time and wonderful service!

name: MrxXman 305
text: Food decent, once the server...that repeatedly told me she was new got it right.  Sat for 10minutes and finally just asked could she refill cokes.  Used to be a great place.  Not so much anymore.  Service is lacking seriously and it is super bad.

name: C W
text: This WAS a great restaurant and the food is still good but with the new management the food is not what it used to be. The pizzas are noticeably smaller than before and the bruschetta is different.  You get about 5 or 6 paper thin bread ‚Ä¶More

name: Joseph Collea
text: Staff was excellent,  very attentive,  and the food was brought out in no time at all.   I had the Roast beef sandwich which was excellent.   Definitely recommend.

name: Gilbert Martell
text: You should try the pizza it's great and not too much of a bad price

name: THE GREAT PAPYRUS
text: The Pizza is great and unless there busy they have great service. But, over all I think the best reason why it was so great is because, my mom is the manager. But, sometimes she is a waitress.

name: Russ Burgen
text: Mediterranean salad was very good. Would be better if it was chilled. 4x4 pizza was good. Staff was very attentive and made us feel welcomed.

name: Robert Ponder
text: This is by far the best pizza around.  We live in Griffin but came all the way here for pizza and it was great. ‚Ä¶More

name: James Davis
text: Moved here recently from Charlotte, and we were excited to know that there was a Brixx in town! Good service and good pizza!

name: Juillet
text: Addie is awesome. She is very proffessionL customer friendly and always makes sure the customer is taken care of.

name: Carrie M
text: We love the pizza and salad at Brixx and usually have a great experience when eating here.  However, tonight was a different story.  We got there pretty early for a Saturday night and there were only a couple of other customers.  The ‚Ä¶More

name: Aimee Whisler
text: Good luck getting what you ask for. The turkey wraps do the even have turkey - they use chicken, or so an employee said. In addition, they fully tolerate sexual harassment of employees,  and when confronted - they deny & let the employee ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Coppenger
text: Spinach artichoke dip was very bland and our waiter was extremely slow. We ordered the bourbon pizza which wasn't bad but my teenager who eats everything told me he didn't need to come back here. Took forever to get our check we won't be back.

name: Jessica Ferguson
text: We have loved brixx in the past when we have went. This time was different. One our server was horrible. We needed the check and he didn‚Äôt care to deal with us clearly. I needed a refill and had to wait 20 mins to get one. Our pizza was ok ‚Ä¶More

name: Leisa Barnette
text: Excellent pizza!  Good specials. Seriously,  some of the best pizza crust I've had.

name: Chelsea San Martin
text: Too much cheese on our pizza's unfortunately...and my husband loves cheese but they over did it on the pepperoni pizza. And it wasn't even fully cooked üëé

name: Cody Arrington
text: They have good pizza and salads. However I rated it three stars because to me the taste is just okay not the best not the worst.

name: Brandon Hicks
text: Stop in this place at last minute and surprised. Good food had found me that day. I had the mushroom wrap, which was better than what was described on the menu. Check this place out!

name: Jay-n-Aye W
text: High quality ingredients, attention to detail, and great service! Loved my buffalo chicken pizza! Highly recommend the lunch pizza and salad combo.

name: x Shyy
text: We went to this location last night to try it out for the first time. We were greeted by the hostess who explained that there was a 10-15 minute wait time. We decided to wait and she gave us a menu to browse. We put the menu back on the ‚Ä¶More

name: Samuel Perez
text: Been here a couple times, and honestly have had a great experience everytime! The staff has been very attentive to our tables, and the food was great too.

name: lauren
text: I have always enjoyed their pizza, but service is not the best. Do NOT get their spinach dip for an appetizer... It's not fresh and when we ordered it it had a huge piece of plastic wrapper cooked in with it.

name: Moonasia Turnbow
text: The  chicken Alfredo is ramen noodles with white sauce it is theeee worst I ever had definitely not worth 17$

name: Tim Wright
text: I would definitely recommend a pizza, they have many different flavors and options. The place has a cool modern/urban feel.

name: Bretts Play
text: I work in the Avenue and after months of construction I was delighted to be invited for a free meal at Brixx. They were using us to train their staff, and honestly, I don't think they needed too much work. The service here is the best part ‚Ä¶More

name: Jacqueline M
text: Horrible service.  Good food. Horrible service

name: Sheena Folsom
text: I came to georgia to visit my husband whose down here for work. Im extremely disappointed eating here. Its not good at all and what makes me even more angry because i have only a few hours left to spend with my husband until i leave this afternoon. Oh and btw there is no woodfire oven here

name: A&S Smith
text: Great staff, great food selections.

name: Alfred Adams
text: A great family and fun place

name: Crissy Rearley
text: I went by myself to Brixx, but I didn't feel the uncomfortable feeling of "Oh, you have no friends to come and eat with you" so that was nice. I ordered the Bruschetta and it was made exactly the way I liked it. Many restaurants offer ‚Ä¶More

name: Deborah Vogt
text: The 4x4 is to die for!!! And if you like pinneapple you need to try their liquid marijuana drinks

name: Amanda Durham
text: The chicken club sandwich is delicious

name: lillian Bradley
text: I went there with my two teenage children for their birthdays. We sat there for 20 minutes with menus on our table and out of three waitresses, no one stop to take our drink order. Another group of people came in after us and their order ‚Ä¶More

name: Edgard Dix
text:
Diego is the most amazing bartender

Great food

name: k greene
text: The food was good.

name: Karlos Peretz
text: Good pizza and wings

name: Chad H
text: Terrible service.. We were sitting for 10 minutes until a waiter approached our table even though the restaurant was completely empty... He took our drink orders went to the bar and began to carry on a conversation with a co worker for literally 10 minutes while we could clearly see him... We stood up and walked out

name: Carla Oswald
text: Excellent service

name: Andy Greene
text: Awesome joint

name: Bryan Griffith
text: Best pizza in town

name: Elisa Artiles
text: Great pizza

name: Matthew Hannah
text: Hours say till Midnight. Called at 11:30 and they would not make a pizza. Instant loss of my business.
